resources.string:
Hi, my name is Thalisson. 

I'm an undergraduate student of Computer Engineering at CIN/UFPE. 

I'm a developer with experience in back-end, front-end, and embedded systems, including Android, Flutter, Firebase, Node.js and Arduino. 
In addition, I am a musician and practicer of sports in my spare time, especially soccer. 

My desire is to make the world better. So, for this, we need technology to simplify people's lives and to improve the life quality. 

Feel free to contact me on any of the following social media: 
LinkedIn: thalissonmt 
GitHub: thalissonmt 
Instagram: thalissonmt 

I'll be glad to help you!
